FuncDef: The reset cpu-defend auto-port-defend attack-source command clears information about auto port defend attack source. The reset cpu-defend auto-port-defend attack-source command clears information about auto port defend attack source.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a slot ID.
If slot slot-id is not specified, information about attack sources on the device is cleared.
The value must be set according to the device configuration.

ExtraInfo: To view information about auto port defend attack source in a specified period, run the reset cpu-defend auto-port-defend attack-source command to clear existing information about auto port defend attack source and run the display cpu-defend auto-port-defend attack-source command.
